xxl.core.xml.operators
Class Operators

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.xml.operators.Operators

public class Operators
extends Object

Contains a lot of useful methods for processing a sequence (Iterator) of XML documents. The documents have to be wrapped into an XMLObject. So each document can posess meta data.

Field Summary

          TransformerFactory which is used by all operators inside this package.

          Function which expects a String parameter that represents an absolute path to a file and returns the filename without the path.

Field Detail

factory

public static TransformerFactory factory
TransformerFactory which is used by all operators inside this package. If a different factory is wanted, then overwrite the reference.

FILENAME_FROM_PATH_FUNCTION

public static final Function FILENAME_FROM_PATH_FUNCTION
Function which expects a String parameter that represents an absolute path to a file and returns the filename without the path.

TO_STRING_FUNCTION

public static final Function TO_STRING_FUNCTION
Function which gets an object and returns the String representation of the object (uses toString() inside).

Method Detail

getXSLTMapFunction

public static Function getXSLTMapFunction(Source xsltSource)
This method returns a Function which performs an XSLT transformation of an XML document which is held inside an XMLObject. This function can be used inside Mapper.

Parameters:
xsltSource - Source which defines the XSLT transformation (for example from an XSLT file using InputSource).
Returns:
Function which performs an XSLT transformation on an XMLObject.

getXSLTMapFunction

public static Function getXSLTMapFunction(String filename)
This method returns a Function which performs an XSLT transformation of an XML document which is held inside an XMLObject. This function can be used inside Mapper.

Parameters:
filename - XSLT file which defines the XSLT transformation.
Returns:
Function which performs an XSLT transformation on an XMLObject.

updateXPathLocation

public static Cursor updateXPathLocation(Iterator xmlIterator,
                                         Function updateXPathFunction)
Maps the stream of XMLObjects and updates the metadata with the identifyer "simplexpathlocation" to a new value that is computed by the updateXPathFunction.

Parameters:
xmlIterator - Input iterator delivering XMLObjects.
updateXPathFunction - Function which maps the meta data entry for "simplexpathlocation" to a new String value.
Returns:
The Cursor.

getStringMatchingPredicate

public static Predicate getStringMatchingPredicate(String matcher)
Returns a Predicate which returns true iff the object matches the String which is given.

Parameters:
matcher - Regular expression.
Returns:
The Predicate.
See Also:
String.matches(String)

getPrefixSuffixMapStringFunction

public static Function getPrefixSuffixMapStringFunction(String prefix,
                                                        String suffix)
Returns a Function which expects a String parameter s and returns prefix+s+suffix as a String.

Parameters:
prefix - Prefix String.
suffix - Suffix String.
Returns:
The Function.

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Test case which transforms the documents inside data/xml/weather according to a xslt-description data/xml/weather/weather.xsl. The output files are written to output/xml/weather.

Parameters:
args - Command line arguments are ignored here.
